Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Meteor Shower
Cannot target geo mask : (Cave)
This spell should only be cast as a last resort as it will likely kill the friendly forces as well as the enemy ones. After being cast strange whizzing sound will emanate from the heavens and soon nothing but the loud impacts from meteors will be heard.
150 magical blunt dmg meteors falls randomly across the entire battlefield.
